passive_1: When hitting an enemy with branch attack, deals 2500 physical damage to the surrounding enemies, cooldown 1.5 seconds

name: Chidori
active: [EP consumption: 5] [Cooldown: 16 seconds] Grant a enhancement buff. While the effect is active, increase all squad members recovery effect by 30%, increase Valkyrja own attack speed by 40%, last for 8 seconds
passive_1: Increase EP gained via attack by 25%

name: CAS-X Saint
passive_1: On hit has 17% chance to deal 700 fire elemental damage

name: CAS-II Minako
active: [EP Consumption: 10] [Cooldown: 10 seconds] Release a shockwave, deal 450% physical damage based on attack power to enemy in front

name: White Star Destroyer
active: [EP Consumption: 12] [Cooldown: 14 seconds] Raise a wave air around self, dealing 450% physical damage to surrounding enemy and inflicts float status on them
